li_aria-controls_aria-selected_data-anal:
One way to make this snippet not have nested interactivity is to remove the `aria-controls` and `aria-selected` attributes, as they are typically used for controlling tabbed interfaces which require nested interactivity. The `role` attribute can also be removed as it is not necessary without the tabbed interface. The modified snippet would look like this:

`<li data-analytics-click-id="GlobalHeaderL2Link" data-analytics-section="Global Header" data-analytics-text="CPF overview">`
